One Mission


Our one mission is to provide you with a first-class, stress-free travel experience.


With our extensive firsthand experience of having traveled to all the places you want to go, we are dedicated to creating personalized itineraries that exceed your expectations.

Our goal is to ensure that your journey is seamless, enjoyable, and tailored to your unique interests and preferences.


From start to finish, we strive to provide you with unparalleled service, insider knowledge, and exclusive perks, so you can travel with confidence and create memories that will last a lifetime.


Trust us to be your trusted travel advisor, and let us take care of every detail, so you can simply relax and enjoy the journey.

Where you want to go...
Is where we've been

  • About Us
  • Why choose Us
  • Our mission

I am a travel advisor who has spent much of my life traveling the world. I was born in Paris, France but have lived and worked in more than 20 different countries. I have resided in the United States for the past 20 plus years. My love of travel began when I was a young adult, traveling the world as I worked for an international resort company. It continued as I became a Senior Manager for a Destination Management Company, which I have been doing for the past 15 years.

Get in Touch

I have booked millions of dollars in hotels, airfare, cruises, excursions, and other forms of transportation. This has led me to have thousands of very happy clients. Over time, I have visited more than 40 countries across five continents, from the bustling cities of Istanbul and Vienna to the rugged landscapes of Finland and Patagonia. I have immersed myself in local cultures, learning to speak several languages fluently and developing a deep appreciation for the diversity of the world.

Get in Touch

My travels have also inspired my business ventures. I now have my own Travel Advising Company called Voyager Traveling that helps others plan their own adventures domestically and abroad. Despite my many travels, I remain grounded and humble, always eager to learn and experience new things. I believe that travel has the power to broaden one's horizons and enrich one's life in ways that few other experiences can match.

Get in Touch

Why in this day and age would I need a Travel Advisor?

Expertise and Knowledge

We possess specialized knowledge and expertise in the travel industry, including destination information, travel regulations, visa requirements, and insider tips, which can save you time and effort in planning your trip.
Plus we've probably been there!

Customized Itineraries

We can create personalized itineraries tailored to your preferences, budget, and travel needs. We always recommend the best flights, accommodations, activities, and tours to ensure a memorable travel experience.
Plus we've probably been there!

Time and Stress Savings

Planning a trip can be time-consuming and overwhelming. We can handle all the research, bookings, and logistics on your behalf, saving you the stress and hassle of coordinating multiple aspects of your trip.
Plus we've probably been there!

Access to Exclusive Deals and Amenities

We often have access to exclusive deals, promotions, and amenities, such as room upgrades, complimentary breakfast, or special perks, that may not be available to the general public, helping you get more value for your money.
Plus we've probably been there!

Support and Assistance

We provide ongoing support and assistance before, during, and after your trip. We can help with changes to your travel plans, provide recommendations in case of unexpected situations, and offer peace of mind knowing that you have a dedicated resource to rely on.
Plus we've probably been there!

Personalized Service

We offer personalized service and attention to detail, taking into account your individual preferences, interests, and travel requirements. We can ensure that your trip is tailored to your unique needs and expectations, resulting in a more enjoyable and hassle-free travel experience.
Plus we've probably been there!

Plus you'll pay the same or less if you use us

What People Say

I have been a regular client of Voyager Traveling for quite some time now, and I have to say that I am thoroughly impressed with their first-class service and extensive knowledge. From the moment I tell them where I want to go to the time I return from my trip, everything is taken care of seamlessly. They have a wealth of knowledge about the destinations they offer, and they have always provided me with personalized recommendations that exceed my expectations. Their attention to detail is unparalleled, and they make sure that every aspect of my trip is taken care of, from the flights to the accommodations and everything in between. I can confidently say that Voyager Traveling has always gone above and beyond to ensure that my travels are not only stress-free but also enjoyable and memorable. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a travel company that offers top-notch service and expertise.

Patricia T.

Regular Client

As a regular client of Voyager Traveling, I have had the pleasure of experiencing some of the most incredible destinations around the world, all thanks to their impeccable itinerary planning. From Lapland to Venice, Santorini to Miami, each trip has been carefully curated and perfectly executed. I have always been impressed with the level of detail that goes into every itinerary. Voyager Traveling's team takes the time to get to know my preferences, interests, and travel style, ensuring that every trip is tailored to my exact needs. Their extensive knowledge of destinations and local culture is evident in the diverse range of activities and experiences included in each itinerary. From exploring hidden gems to indulging in local cuisine, every aspect of the trip is designed to provide a truly immersive and unforgettable experience. Overall, I highly recommend Voyager Traveling for anyone looking for an exceptional travel experience. Their dedication to providing personalized itineraries and exceptional service sets them apart from the rest. Thank you, Voyager Traveling, for always exceeding my expectations and sending me on unforgettable journeys.

Sabrina R.

Regular Client
